## How to participate?

Look out for our email from faculty and the SMART coordinator for more information. Recruitment will begin the quarter before the program is implemented.

## Expectations

- Create a project that an undergraduate student can be completed within 6 weeks.
  - Set pre-requisite
  - Gather teaching materials

- Mentor an undergraduate student for the duration of the quarter.

- Meet with an undergraduate student for 1 hour a week.

- Monitor student progress and adjust the project as needed.
